name: ivory
content:
ivory noun
(SUBSTANCE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the hard yellowish-white substance that forms the tusks of some animals such as elephants, used especially in the past to make decorative objects: Ivory is a softer material than you might imagine. a ban on ivory trading
[ C usually plural ] an object made from ivory: a collection of Japanese ivories
